name: E.D.A.S Token
description: E.D.A.S is a suite of ENSO AGENTS that identify and auto execute DeFi strategies in Lending, Liquidity Provision, and Looping with LSTs on multiple chains like Solana, SUI, Movement, SOON, etc. EDAS functions independently as fund managers holding unique investment viewpoints and generating profits. - Optimize DeFi: AI-driven strategies for maximizing returns across liquidity farming, lending, staking, and LSTs. - Simplify cross-chain: One-click execution of cross-chain strategies. Automated fund management across multiple chains. - Co-ownership: Tokenized agents, allowing users to co-own and benefit from agents success. - Rewards: Distribute agent revenue to EDAS's token stakers, creating a deflationary model and increasing token value.
